08.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
11.10.2012 SH SCR17574 Changed Blob Ansi to Unicode blob
17.04.2012 JH SCR17235 Added test on CLPR125_DELETED = 'N' in Search for client person task
04.04.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
01.09.2011 AS SCR#11028 Calling new version of UFB501 when GSET(4000)=Y
29.07.2011 SH SCR16635 Extended INVO_INVOICENO to alpha 20 for sort on INVO
29.06.2011 GB SCR16502 Added the parts for RECIPIENT = 4/6/7/8/13 and written
line1 - line7 in the "full" adress box only if the line has a vale <> blank
18.07.2010 GB SCR15623 Removed the link GNDP
20.02.2009 GB SCR14429 Changed path for LOGO (part 1), changed locate in
link for ADMN (part 5)
14.11.2008 GB SCR14092 Added task GetAndSaveWindowPosition
01.09.2008 SH SCR13921 Use now PADR address fields if DEBC address fields are
empty for line 5/6
28.07.2008 SH SCR13804 Added DEBC_LANGUAGE (uses instead of DEBH_LAGUAGE if<>'')
26.06.2008 SH SCR13684 Now header line 6, see task"Transfer data" is always
written, test on TPMO_COUNTRYCODE <> HOFF_HADR_COUNTRY are completely removed
13.06.2008 SH SCR13684 Added writing of header line 6, see task"Transfer data"
05.06.2008 SH SCR13684 Fixed bug in parts where line 6 of the header has to be
filled with description of the country if TPMO_COUNTRYCODE <> HOFF_HADR_COUNTRY
26.05.2008 AK SCR13650 cal BXA910 with Currency as parameter (was blank)
22.05.2008 AK SCR13643 fix bug in the implementation of SCR13640 (Hot Fix)
20.05.2008 GB SCR13640 Changed condition for the update TPMO.LANGUAGE='GB' from
v.ResultUFB570(MlsLanguage) <> 0 to
v.ResultUFB570(MlsLanguage) <> 0 or not(rct.CODE)
21.03.2007 AK SCR12377 skip new last parmeter when calling contact selection scr
13.03.2007 AK SCR12037 added handling for templates without invoices
04.09.2006 JJ SCR11818 Using UFB570 to check MLS-support of recipient's language
21.08.2006 AK SCR11740 Fix bug in task 'Search for client person'
11.05.2006 CO Edwin: use word LOGO template also on ADMNO=8
09.05.2006 CO SCR11198 corrected windows title name display
03.05.2006 CO SCR11109 GUI enhancement: added placement to radio-buttons
and added update of V.COUNTRYNAME for debtors
28.04.2006 CO NoSCR Transfer of HEADER1+2 set from No to Yes
27.04.2006 AS SCR11028 changed call to UFB501 (activated only if special .ini
flag in [MGWORD] section is set.
12.04.2006 CO SCR10925 Init of description field in invoices
28.03.2006 CO SCR10691 Changed language for the time of letter creation
from the user's to the recipients language.
23.03.2006 CO SCR10699 Changed Radiobutton handling to use COCO table

Task searches for a client person with suitable data-properties.
(This is done be a loop that run max. 2 times)
If it finds 1 person only, the search is done.
If it finds more than 1 person, the user has to select one of those.
In second call, the person is clear already,
in first call it is empty and maybe the record is already unique without person:
If 1 unique person was found, it can be saved immediately:
Person found, no need for a 2. call in the parent:
Save the records (=persons) data:
If 2 (or more) persons were found, let the user select one,
if no person was found, he may create one new person on the fly:
(Don't do this, if search was done WITH department, just upon 2. call WITHOUT
Record not unique, therefore a 2. call will be necessary:
Control rights and proceed, if legal:
At least the user needs query rights to user the selection table for persons:
If 2 persons have been found, the user has to select 1 of those:

If more than 1 debtor, a selection list appears.
Once a unique record was found,
the requested data can be saved to virtuells in the task suffix.

Save the records (=persons) data:

Part 7: Invoices

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast( sum(INVO_AACTUALI) as decimal (14,2)), INVO_CURRENCY from :1/invo where INVO_DEBC_NO=:2 and INVO_AACTUALI<>0 group by INVO_CURRENCY order by INVO_CURRENCY for fetch only
